original_text:
When Ruth came to her mother-in-law, Naomi asked, “How did it go, my daughter?”
Then she told her everything Boaz had done for her
korean_text: 룻이 시어머니에게 가니 그가 이르되 내 딸아 어떻게 되었느냐 하니 룻이 그 사람이 자기에게 행한 것을 다 알리고

sentences.original_text: When Ruth came to her mother-in-law
How did it go, my daughter?
everything Boaz had done for her
sentences.korean_translation: 보아스가 그녀를 위해 해주었던 모든 것을
